tag_list: thorsten, nolte, digital, business, advertising, upfront-media, upfront, media
overview:
Thorsten runs and owns UPFRONT MEDIA. UPFRONT MEDIA is a technology based marketing services company.

Thorsten has been in the Advertising and technology industry for 15 years and i passionate about it and how it has the ability to connect people and purposes for betterment of the planet but also for industry and profit. Not, however for the pursuit of harm.

Thorsten lives in Singapore with his wife and child and works across the Asia Pacific region. Originally from the UK Thorsten relocated to Singapore for business in 2007.
